C:\\Users\\Nana\\Projects\\nest-serverle.serviceRawFile:
service: nest-serverless-app # Name of the service

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs18.x # NodeJS version
  region: us-east-1 # AWS region
  memorySize: 512 # Memory size for the lambda function
  timeout: 10 # Timeout for the lambda function
  stage: dev # Stage of the service
  environment:
    DB_HOST: ${env:DB_HOST}
    DB_PORT: ${env:DB_PORT}
    DB_USER: ${env:DB_USER}
    DB_PASS: ${env:DB_PASS}
    DB_NAME: ${env:DB_NAME}
    JWT_SECRET: ${env:JWT_SECRET}

functions:
  api:
    handler: dist/main.handler
    events:
      - http:
        path: /
        method: ANY
      - http:
        path: '{proxy+}'
        method: ANY
